data.message: Thanks Facebook for keeping use together knowing each and ever one loving and caring for people we know and don't know until you came along thanks

replies.message: You're very welcome, Jimmie! Thanks for the compliment, we can't wait to share it with our team. :) -Jordan
Thank you for keeping me in touch my family and friends from the Philippines. I'm in usa.
A day without Facebook is like a day without sunshine. Thank you.

Lived here in the USA for 50 years!  Originally from Scotland, and used to/had to write air-letters to keep in touch with friends and family.  This,/FB  makes it so much easier, not to mention the cost and time delay to get current news from Scotland.  Thank you, it is a Blessing.
Love being able to connect with long lost family - this has been a blessing.
There's so much to be grateful for. Well done FB!
I agree  withall the people.Thank you for  everything.
Thank you FB for allowing all of us to share our favorite pics, favorite topics, alittle bit of complaining lol and best of all keeping connected with long distance friends and family! FB U ROCK! 👍 ✊

Dear Facebook, you don't imagine how happy I'm, since you exist It is the best thing happen in my life lately . I will check all that happen during year 2915. Wishing you the best , God Bless You Ever <3
Ty Fb I found my dad who I have never meet threw FB
All of the things you guys are saying on here are beautiful but the spelling and grammar mistakes have me like 😜😫
Me Gusta Facebook Las Veces k Me Meto A La paginar  Mayor Mente Para ver Noticias y Casos Inportante y las Páginas K Me GUSTAN Buenas Noches 😆😊😀😜😄
Facebook you are a blessing in a time when family and friends wonder away from each other.  You've made it so much easier to stay in touch with each other! You're awesome! Thanks Bunches!
You made my life easy .Thanks Facebook!
